titleStmt.title: Die Jovis 20. Januarii. 1641. Lords House. Whereas the Lords in the Upper House of Parliament, do finde that there are many petitions concerning private persons depending now before their Lordships, and conceive that many more may be brought into that house.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings Most Excellent Majestie and by the Assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
